attributes.action: Give MPs an extended winter break for all the hard work they've done.
attributes.background: With Brexit all nicely wrapped up and a tough 2018 under their belt, I believe MPs of all persuasion deserve an extend break this winter. They've had to put up with us quite a lot this year and the least we can do is give back. There's not much else on going into next year, so why not?

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because MPs' leave arrangements are not the responsibility of the UK Government or House of Commons as a whole.
